name: Magnet Playground
description:
Late entry for Trijam #68.9

Theme: Opposite Ends

Time it took: about 6 hours (the goal was 3 hours)

It's a physics playground where you control a ball with magnets attached at the opposite ends of a rope. There's no goal for now, just play around with the physics. Don't forget how magnets work - opposites attract.

The challenge was to make it in 3 hours but it took me more la 6 hours, even after 1 day of testing the physics.

WASD - move

E or Q - change magnet polarity (F change polarity of both)

Mouse - camera

***UPDATE: Linux version is up! Let's also hope it works!

***Sorry I wasn't able to do a Linux version for now. I know no code and just started 2 months ago on game developing.
